trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a control designer requires a preview instance of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um controle de designer requer uma instância de visualização do controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Apply the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute to a control designer class to indicate the type of preview control that is supported by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Aplique o atributo de SupportsPreviewControlAttribute para uma classe do designer de controle para indicar o tipo de controle de visualização que é compatível com o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to change a preview control for design-time rendering without affecting the actual persisted instance of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Use esse atributo para alterar um controle de visualização para renderização de tempo de design sem afetar a instância real persistente do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute when declaring a custom designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você especificar o SupportsPreviewControlAttribute ao declarar uma classe do designer personalizada que é derivada da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> de

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property for the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade para o atributo SupportsPreviewControlAttribute determina o comportamento para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>e os <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>membros de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade `true` para indicar que o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para gerar o HTML de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade `false` para indicar que o designer retorna a instância de controle, especificamente o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>propriedade, do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para o objeto de controle são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner> class is marked with the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>classe está marcada com o SupportsPreviewControlAttribute definido como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer uses the preview control with the automatic style formatting task, which allows the user to preview various autoformat stylesthat can be applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: O designer usa o controle de visualização com o estilo automático tarefa formatação, o que permite que o usuário a visualizar várias stylesthat de AutoFormatação pode ser aplicada para o calendário.

trans-unit.source: As the user selects different autoformat styles in the user interface, the selected style scheme is applied to the preview control.
trans-unit.target: O usuário selecionar estilos de formatação automática diferente na interface do usuário, o esquema de estilo selecionado é aplicado ao controle de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Applying a new style to the preview control does not change the scheme that is applied to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar um novo estilo para o controle de visualização não altera o esquema é aplicado à instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>controle no designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o SupportsPreviewControlAttribute não for especificado na declaração do designer de controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>comportamento equivale à especificação de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Designer classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members, and ignore the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Designer classes derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>membros e ignorar o atributo SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To determine the expected behavior for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, see the reference documentation for the derived control designer class.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o comportamento esperado para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, consulte a documentação de referência para a classe de designer controle derivado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: For general information about using attributes, see [Attributes Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) and [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre o uso de atributos, consulte [visão geral de atributos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) e [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about design-time attributes, see [Attributes and Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre atributos de tempo de design, consulte [suporte de tempo de Design e atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class and sets the initial value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> classe e define o valor inicial de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não precisa criar uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>classe diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> to the class declaration of the custom control designer in the source code.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>à declaração de classe do designer de controle personalizado no código-fonte.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The initial value to assign for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor inicial a ser atribuído para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class that is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> classe que é definido como o valor padrão de visualização.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the Default field is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade de campo padrão é definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method to determine whether the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>método para determinar se o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor padrão de visualização.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same preview attribute setting as the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado representa a mesma configuração de atributo de visualização da instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Equals method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método Equals substitui o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Equals method compares two instances based on the value of their <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Equals Compara duas instâncias com base no valor de suas <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if obj is a attribute and its value is the same as this instance of ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é um atributo e seu valor é o mesmo que esta instância do ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método GetHashCode substitui o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método GetHashCode gera o mesmo código de hash de dois objetos são iguais de acordo com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as hash tables.
trans-unit.target: O código hash é adequado para uso em algoritmos e estruturas de dados, como tabelas de hash de hash.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash de inteiro de 32 bits para a instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class is set to the default preview attribute value.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> classe é definida como o valor padrão do atributo de visualização.

trans-unit.source: The IsDefaultAttribute method compares the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object with the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> field.
trans-unit.target: O método IsDefaultAttribute compara o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>objeto com o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default>campo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> is equal to the default preview attribute value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref> for igual ao valor padrão do atributo de visualização; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer requires a temporary preview control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer de controle requer um controle de visualização temporárias em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify a value for the SupportsPreviewControl property by applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute to a custom designer class declaration.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você especificar um valor para a propriedade SupportsPreviewControl aplicando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>atributo a uma declaração de classe personalizada do designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SupportsPreviewControl property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade SupportsPreviewControl para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>atributo determina o comportamento para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>e os <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>membros de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade SupportsPreviewControl como `true` para indicar que o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para gerar o HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade SupportsPreviewControl como `false` para indicar que o designer retorna a instância de controle, especificamente o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>propriedade, do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para o objeto de controle são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control for design-time preview; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer uses an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> control that is contained in the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para visualização de tempo de design. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o designer usa uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>controle que está contido no designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>
